FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQs.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about GhasilHub platform

0.question: What is GhasilHub?
0.answer: GhasilHub is a smart online platform designed to simplify laundry management, from billing and customer tracking to reports and branch management.

1.question: How can I train my staff to use GhasilHub?
1.answer: Our system is designed to be intuitive and easy to use. We provide training guides, videos, and dedicated support to help your team adapt quickly.

2.question: Does GhasilHub support multiple branches?
2.answer: Yes. You can manage multiple laundry branches from one dashboard. Each additional branch requires an annual add-on fee.

3.question: Can I send notifications to customers automatically?
3.answer: Absolutely. GhasilHub sends automated reminders and order updates to your customers via WhatsApp.

4.question: What happens if the system goes down?
4.answer: While we ensure high uptime, unexpected outages may occur. We always work to restore services as quickly as possible.

5.question: Is customer data secure?
5.answer: Yes. All customer and business data is stored securely on encrypted servers, and we comply with Omani data protection regulations.

6.question: Can I try GhasilHub before subscribing?
6.answer: Yes, we provide a demo version so you can explore the system before committing.

7.question: What payment methods are available?
7.answer: You can pay via bank transfer, credit card, or other available methods in Oman.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: GhasilHub Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Review our privacy policy and data protection practices for using GhasilHub laundry management system.
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to GhasilHub.com , the smart laundry management software. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the legal and safe use of our services in compliance with applicable laws in the Sultanate of Oman. By using the platform, you agree to this policy in all its terms.

collecting.title: 1. Collecting information
collecting.subtitle: When you register and use the system, we collect the following data:
content: User data (name, phone number, email, password).
Laundry data (business name, address, commercial register if available).
Final customer data (name, phone number, orders, invoices).
Technical usage data (IP address, device and browser type, time and date).

usage.title: 2. Use of information
usage.subtitle: The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
content: Manage accounts and branches and link them to the control panel.
Issuing invoices and organizing customer orders.
Send notifications and alerts to customers via WhatsApp or email.
Providing technical support and developing services.
Preparing reports and statistics to improve performance.

sharing.title: 3. Sharing information
content: We do not sell or rent your data to any third party.
Some data may be shared with service providers (such as hosting servers or message gateways) solely for the purpose of operating the system.
Official bodies in the Sultanate of Oman may request access to data in accordance with the law.

security.title: 4. Data storage and security
content: Data is stored on certified secure servers.
We take technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, or deletion.
In the event of a technical failure or breach, we are committed to informing customers within a reasonable period of time.

whatsapp.title: 5. Customer notifications via WhatsApp
content: The system sends automated messages (invoices, alerts, readiness notifications) via WhatsApp.
By using the System, you acknowledge that you have obtained your customers' consent to send these messages.
GhasilHub is not responsible for any objections from customers unless their prior consent is activated.

outages.title: 6. Malfunctions and Service Outages
content: The system may be temporarily down due to maintenance or unexpected server failures.
We are not responsible for any direct or indirect losses resulting from this downtime.
We are doing our best to restore service as soon as possible.

rights.title: 7. User Rights
content: You have the right to request a copy of your data held with us.
You can request to modify or delete your data at any time.
You can cancel your subscription to the system while still being liable for the fees due for the previous period.

payment.title: 8. Payment and Return Policy
content: Subscriptions are annual and non-refundable after activation.
In the event of a long-term malfunction or permanent system outage, the user may be compensated at the discretion of the administration.

amendments.title: 9. Amendments to the Policy
content: GhasilHub reserves the right to modify this policy at any time.
Users will be notified of any material changes via email or through the control panel.
